sentences.en: ‘She’s failed her test again.’ ‘What a shame!’
sentences.cn: “她又没通过测验。”“真遗憾！”

sentences.en: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.cn: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.en: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.cn: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

sentences.en: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.cn: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.en: He seems to want to exhibit his shame.
sentences.cn: 他似乎想要让大家知道自己感到羞愧。

sentences.en: He tried to deny it. Shame on him!
sentences.cn: 他还想抵赖，真不害臊！

sentences.en: He would not let neighbours shame him into silence.
sentences.cn: 邻居们试图想让他自感羞愧而从此闭口，他是不会乖乖就范的。

sentences.en: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.cn: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.en: Her father and her brothers would die of shame.
sentences.cn: 她的父亲和兄弟们会羞愧死的。

sentences.en: His face burned with shame.
sentences.cn: 他的脸因羞愧而发烫。

sentences.en: His playing really put me to shame.
sentences.cn: 他的表演真让我自惭形秽。

sentences.en: I can’t imagine why they canceled your show, Tracy. That’s such a shame .
sentences.cn: 我搞不懂他们为什么把你的演出取消了，特蕾西。多可惜啊。

sentences.en: I confess it with shame -- shrunk icily into myself, like a snail.
sentences.cn: 我羞愧地忏悔了 —— 冷冰冰地退缩, 像个蜗牛.

sentences.en: I don'twant to bring shame on the family name.
sentences.cn: 我不想玷污家族的名声。

sentences.en: I nearly died of shame.
sentences.cn: 我羞愧难当。

sentences.en: I was, to my shame, a coward.
sentences.cn: 我很惭愧，我是个懦夫。

sentences.en: I will return, find you, love you, marry you and live without shame.
sentences.cn: 我会回去，找到你，爱你，娶你，活的光明正大。《赎罪》

sentences.en: It shames me to say it, but I lied.
sentences.cn: 说出来真难为情，我撒谎了。

sentences.en: It’s a shame about the weather.
sentences.cn: 天气不好，真是遗憾。

sentences.en: It’s a shame that you have to leave so soon.
sentences.cn: 你这么快就要走了，真遗憾。

sentences.en: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.en: Mary was so embarrassed. She could only hide her face in shame.
sentences.cn: 玛丽感到特别难堪,她恨不得找个地缝钻进去.

sentences.en: She felt a deep sense of shame and repugnance.
sentences.cn: 她深感羞耻和厌恶。

sentences.en: She felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.cn: 她深感羞耻。

sentences.en: She had shamed her family name (= done something that made her family lose honour ) .
sentences.cn: 她玷污了家族的名声。

sentences.en: she puts me to shame, she's so capable.
sentences.cn: 她使我觉得尴尬，她太能干了。

sentences.en: There is a sense of shame, sometimes carried to extremes.
sentences.cn: 心中有羞愧感，有时候甚至无地自容。

sentences.en: They feel shame and guilt as though it is their fault.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得羞愧和内疚，就好像这是他们的错。

sentences.en: To my shame, I never thanked him for his kindness.
sentences.cn: 我感到惭愧的是对他的好意我从未表示过感谢.

sentences.en: What a shame we missed the wedding.
sentences.cn: 我们错过了这场婚礼，太可惜了。

sentences.en: Your productivity has put the rest of us to shame.
sentences.cn: 你的高效率使我们其他人无地自容

words.tran_cn: 可耻的；不体面的；不道德的；猥亵的
无耻的；不要脸的；伤风败俗的
不知羞耻地；厚着脸皮地
丢脸,悔恨,憎恨,烦乱,懊恼
使失望,驯服,使恭顺,使羞愧

trans.tran_cn: （表示同情或喜爱）太遗憾了，好极了
羞耻，惭愧，耻辱，让人遗憾的事
trans.tran_en: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
